overview.role_description: Phoebe is a Spectro character with dual roles: Main DPS and Support. Regardless of the role, her playstyle revolves around Heavy Attack DMG.
overview.synopsis: Core Mechanic: Forte Circuit Phoebe can switch states by maxing out [Prayer]. When [Prayer] is full, her Basic Attack and Resonance Skill icons glow. Hold Basic Attack: Enters Absolution (Main DPS mode). Hold Resonance Skill: Enters Confession (Support mode). Both modes cannot coexist.
overview.rotation:
[Prayer]: Auto regenerates over time, up to 120 points. It replenishes at 5 points per second, refilling in 24 seconds. Cannot switch states while Forte Gauge [Divine Voice] is not depleted, even if [Prayer] is full. You won't also auto exit the state when the [Divine Voice] is depleted.
Divine Voice fully replenishes upon entering Absolution (Main DPS mode) or Confession (Support mode) and is consumed when using enhanced Heavy Attacks.

texts.name: Luminous Hymn
texts.effectDescription: Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus and (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) {Cus:Sap,S=time P=times SapTag=2} for (6/6/6/6/6)s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by (30%/37.5%/45%/52.5%/60%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Stringmaster
texts.effectDescription: Grants (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) Attribute DMG Bonus. When dealing Resonance Skill DMG, increases ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) times. This effect lasts for (5/5/5/5/5)s. When the wielder is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%).

texts.name: Rime-Draped Sprouts
texts.effectDescription: Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). While the wielder is on the field, using Resonance Skill grants (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) times for (6/6/6/6/6)s. At (3/3/3/3/3) stacks or above, casting Outro Skill consumes all stacks of this effect and grants the wielder (52%/65%/78%/91%/104%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus for (27/27/27/27/27)s, effective when the wielder is off the field.

texts.name: Nightmare: Mourning Aix
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Nightmare: Mourning Aix to attack surrounding enemies, dealing 273.60% Spectro DMG. DMG dealt to enemies inflicted by Spectro Frazzle is increased by 100.00%.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Spectro DMG + 10%

texts.name: Impermanence Heron
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Impermanence Heron to fly up and smack down, dealing 310.56% Havoc DMG.



Long press to stay as Impermanence Heron and continuously spit flames, each attack dealing 55.73% Havoc DMG.



Once the initial attack lands on any enemy, the current character regains 10 Resonance Energy. If the current character uses their Outro Skill within the next 15s, the next character's damage dealt will be boosted by 12% for 15s.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Energy Regen + 10%.

texts.name: Emerald of Genesis
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by (6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) time(s). This effect lasts for (10/10/10/10/10)s.

texts.name: Nightmare: Mourning Aix
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Nightmare: Mourning Aix to attack surrounding enemies, dealing 273.60% Spectro DMG. DMG dealt to enemies inflicted by Spectro Frazzle is increased by 100.00%.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Presence
texts.description: Mid-air Heavy Attack can be cast 1 more.

texts.name: Revelation
texts.description: When in the Absolution status and Confession status, Spectro DMG Bonus is increased by 12%.

texts.name: Attentive Heart
texts.description:
Deal Spectro DMG equal to 528.41% of Phoebe's ATK to nearby targets.

- Absolution Enhancement: Increase DMG Multiplier by 255%.

- Confession Enhancement: Grant Silent Prayer to the Resonator on the field, reducing the Spectro RES of nearby targets by 10% and granting 100% Spectro Frazzle DMG Amplification. When Spectro Frazzle inflicts DMG, extend Spectro Frazzle's damage interval by 50%. This effect lasts 30s or until Phoebe switches to Absolution status.

texts.name: O Come Divine Light
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks of Holy Light, dealing Spectro DMG.



Heavy Attack

Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Consume STA to ride the staff and dive down from mid-air to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.



Mid-air Heavy Attack

Consume STA to ride on the staff for a distance.

- Can be re-cast after a Mid-Air Dodge or using Grapple.



Dodge Counter

After a successful Dodge, quickly use Basic Attack to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

- When Phoebe is inside the Ring of Mirrors, Dodge Counter becomes Chamuel's Star: Dodge Counter.

texts.name: To Where Light Shines
texts.description:
Summon a Ring of Mirrors at the target location, making the target hit stagnate for 2s and dealing Spectro DMG. The stagnation effect can be applied to 12 targets max for each Ring of Mirrors. Using Resonance Skill again shortly after the summoning teleports Phoebe to the Ring of Mirrors' location, dealing Spectro DMG.

Unable to teleport if Phoebe is too far from the Ring of Mirrors.



Ring of Mirrors

- Ring of Mirrors lasts for 30s. When Phoebe summons a new Ring of Mirrors, the existing Ring of Mirrors disappears.

- When Phoebe is outside of the Ring of Mirrors, a Basic Attack or Dodge Counter that hits the Ring of Mirrors will refract Holy Light, which deals Spectro DMG to targets inside the Ring of Mirrors and pulls the targets hit to the center of the ring. The DMG dealt is considered Basic Attack DMG. Can be triggered once every 0.5s.

- When Phoebe is inside the Ring of Mirrors, Basic Attack becomes Basic Attack Chamuel's Star, which performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Spectro DMG, considered Basic Attack DMG.

texts.name: Radiant Invocation
texts.description:
When Phoebe's Prayer is full, consume all Prayer to cast one of the following skills:

- Hold Basic Attack to cast Heavy Attack Absolution Litany, dealing Spectro DMG and applying 1 of Spectro Frazzle to the targets hit. Phoebe enters Absolution status, which allows her to deal more DMG.

- Hold Resonance Skill to cast Resonance Skill Utter Confession, dealing Spectro DMG and applying 1 of Spectro Frazzle to the targets hit. Phoebe enters Confession status, which allows her to better exploit Spectro Frazzle.

- Absolution and Confession cannot coexist. Entering into one will end the other.

- When Divine Voice is not exhausted, Phoebe is unable to cast Heavy Attack Absolution Litany and Resonance Skill Utter Confession.

- When Divine Voice is exhausted, Phoebe will not exit the Absolution or Confession status.



Heavy Attack: Starflash

When Phoebe has Divine Voice, casting Basic Attack Stage 3 or Dodge Counter replaces the next Heavy Attack with Heavy Attack: Starflash, which deals Spectro DMG at the cost of 30 Divine Voice.

- Absolution Enhancement: Reduce the cost of Divine Voice by 15. When the targets hit have Spectro Frazzle, the skill gains 256% DMG Amplification.

- Confession Enhancement: Apply 5 of Spectro Frazzle to the targets hit.



Prayer 

Phoebe can hold up to 120 Prayer.

Phoebe automatically gains 5 Prayer every second.



Divine Voice

Phoebe can hold up to 60 Divine Voice.

Casting Heavy Attack Absolution Litany or Resonance Skill Utter Confession restores 60 Divine Voice.

texts.name: Dawn of Enlightenment
texts.description:
Phoebe concentrates the light in her hands into the Mirror of Enlightenment and smashes it, dealing Spectro DMG.

- Absolution Enhancement: Increase DMG Multiplier by 255%.

- Confession Enhancement: Apply 8 of Spectro Frazzle to targets hit.

texts.name: Golden Grace
texts.description: Knock back nearby targets and deal Spectro DMG.

Phoebe automatically gains 5 Prayer every second.



Divine Voice

Casting Heavy Attack Absolution Litany or Resonance Skill Utter Confession restores 60 Divine Voice.

texts.name: Golden Grace
texts.description: Knock back nearby targets and deal Spectro DMG.

texts.name: Warm Light and Bedside Wishes
texts.description:
When in Absolution, Resonance Liberation Dawn of Enlightenment now increases DMG Multiplier by 480% instead of 255%. 

When in Confession, Resonance Liberation Dawn of Enlightenment increases DMG Multiplier by 90% and applies Spectro Frazzle to the targets with the maximum stack the targets can receive.

texts.name: A Boat Adrift in Tears
texts.description:
When in Absolution, DMG dealt by Outro Skills to targets with Spectro Frazzle is Amplified by 120%.

When in Confession, Silent Prayer grants 120% more DMG Amplification for Spectro Frazzle.

texts.name: Daisy Wreaths and Dreams
texts.description:
When in Absolution, the DMG Multiplier of Heavy Attack Starflash is increased by 91%.

When in Confession, the DMG Multiplier of Heavy Attack Starflash is increased by 249%.

texts.name: Ringing Bells on Wings Aloft
texts.description: When Basic Attack, Basic Attack Chamuel's Star, Dodge Counter, or Chamuelâ€˜s Star: Dodge Counter hits, the target's Spectro RES is reduced by 10% for 30s.

texts.name: Prayer to the Distant Light
texts.description: Casting Intro Skill Golden Grace increases Phoebe's Spectro DMG Bonus by 12% for 15s.

texts.name: Whispering Chirps in Silence
texts.description:
Targets entering the Ring of Mirrors are stagnated for an additional 2s. The stagnation effect affects all targets entering the Ring of Mirrors and can be applied to 12 targets max for each Ring of Mirrors. Each target will only be affected by this effect once.

When in Absolution or Confession, summoning a Ring of Mirrors with Resonance Skill increases Phoebe's ATK by 10% for 20s, and triggers an extra Heavy Attack Starflash at the Ring of Mirrors' location. This Heavy Attack Starflash does not consume Divine Voice and is not considered as casting a Heavy Attack.
